string-array.name: updates
string-array.item: 1.6 : Put Estern Egg & Put image source.
2.5 : Testing on 2.3 GingerBread at Galaxy Series
3.1 : Support Multi School System and Froyo and GingerBread
3.5 : Modify Errors and add page for sending an email to developer
4.1 : Change Analog Clock Theme into Logo
4.2 : Modify Excuting Errors for data unsupportable month.
4.3 : Optimize increses of code reuses and clear unnessary codes.
4.5 : Change Theme with modifying July meal data.
4.6 : Project Lee Ho has been started.
